article.title: Agile Defense to Support DARPA
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Agile Defense Inc., Fairfax, Va., was awarded a cost-plus-award-fee contract with a maximum value of $31,878,082 for unclassified information technology services for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency. The Army Contracting Command, Research Triangle Park, N.C., is the contracting activity.
